<Link id="l03780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3780"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is not a multiple of 64-bits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3781"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> Realigned(CI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint/#af7e1934ed72a405ef073ea5f9bbe828e">getValue</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3782"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t ExtraBits = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3783"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExtraBitsSize = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> &amp; 63;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3784"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3785"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ExtraBitsSize) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3786"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The bit width of the data is not a multiple of 64-bits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3787"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The extra bits are expected to be at the end of the chunk of the memory.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3788"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Little endian:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3789"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#42; Nothing to be done, just record the extra bits to emit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3790"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Big endian:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3791"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#42; Record the extra bits to emit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3792"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#42; Realign the raw data to emit the chunks of 64-bits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3793"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.isBigEndian()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3794"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Basically the structure of the raw data is a chunk of 64-bits cells:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3795"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    0        1         BitWidth / 64</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3796"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#91;chunk1&#93;&#91;chunk2&#93; ... &#91;chunkN&#93;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3797"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The most significant chunk is chunkN and it should be emitted first.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3798"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// However, due to the alignment issue chunkN contains useless bits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3799"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Realign the chunks so that they contain only useful information:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3800"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ExtraBits     0       1       (BitWidth / 64) - 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3801"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       chu&#91;nk1 chu&#93;&#91;nk2 chu&#93; ... &#91;nkN-1 chunkN&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3802"><Highlight kind="normal">      ExtraBitsSize = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(ExtraBitsSize, 8);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3803"><Highlight kind="normal">      ExtraBits = Realigned.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ada7af1de63a848b2f452d63958de39fe">getRawData</a>()&#91;0&#93; &amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3804"><Highlight kind="normal">        (((uint64&#95;t)-1) &gt;&gt; (64 - ExtraBitsSize));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3805"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> &gt;= 64)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3806"><Highlight kind="normal">        Realigned.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#af338e23a90c301183968435e80cd6a27">lshrInPlace</a>(ExtraBitsSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3808"><Highlight kind="normal">      ExtraBits = Realigned.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ada7af1de63a848b2f452d63958de39fe">getRawData</a>()&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> / 64&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

RawData&#91;e - i - 1&#93; : RawData&#91;i&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
